thread.title: CRMLS Continues to Position Real Estate Professionals as Ma
thread.title_full: CRMLS Continues to Position Real Estate Professionals as Ma

author: California Regional MLS
title: CRMLS Continues to Position Real Estate Professionals as Ma
text:
SAN DIMAS, Calif. , Oct. 5, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- With the goal of giving brokers and agents the tools to maximize the use of data to achieve business goals, California Regional Multiple Listing Service (CRMLS) is pleased to introduce Infosparks as the latest addition to its family of free products offered to CRMLS association members. Infosparks by 10K Research and Marketing, now part of ShowingTime, allows real estate professionals to graphically communicate the reality of the market in real-time data by using a high level of local geographical detail.
"We were thrilled when CRMLS decided to become ShowingTime 10K's largest partner," said ShowingTime President, Michael Lane . "Infosparks offers fresh market perspectives in seconds, not hours."
Art Carter , CEO of CRMLS says, "I believe Infosparks will fill a niche and be a success in allowing agents to respond to their clients' need of credible market data in an easy-to-read and simple-to-share format. We are excited about this new partnership with ShowingTime 10K through the Infosparks tool."
About California Regional Multiple Listing Service (CRMLS)
California Regional MLS (CRMLS) is the nation's largest and most recognized subscriber-based MLS, dedicated to servicing more than 78,000+ real estate professionals from 35 Associations, 3 Boards of REALTORSÂ® and 1 MLS. CRMLS is the industry powerhouse and thrives on providing the most relevant products and services to its subscribers. www.crmls.org
About ShowingTime 10K
ShowingTime 10K provides showing systems, interactive market analytics tools, and easy-to-read market reports for MLSs, associations, brokers and other real estate companies. ShowingTime products are used by organizations representing more than 800,000 real estate professionals. Visit showingtime.com and 10kresearch.com .
SOURCE California Regional MLS
